Package.title: Example
Package.Description: This package contains some image processing operators based on functions of the OpenCV library.

Variant.title: OpenCV image 8-bit
Variant.Description: Image based on the OpenCV matrix implementation.

Operator.title: Image blur
Operator.Description: This operators convolutes the input image with a Gaussian kernel of a given width. The operator can operate in-place.

Parameter.title: Data flow

EnumValue.title: Manual
EnumValue.Description: The operator is initialized with an input and a destination input.

EnumValue.title: In place
EnumValue.Description: The operator is initialized with only one input and the image at this input is blurred in-place

Parameter.Description: Determines the memory management of the operator.

Parameter.title: Kernel size
Parameter.Description: The size of the Gaussian kernel.

Input.title: Source
Input.Description: The input image. If the operator is initialized as an in-place operation this image will be blurred.

Input.title: Destination
Input.Description: The image which will contain the blurred version of the image Source.

Output.title: Result
Output.Description: The the blurred image. This is either the destination image (no in-place operation) or the input image (in-place operation).
